The Black Brant or Pacific Brent Goose , Branta bernicla nigricans , is a sub - species of the Brent Goose that breeds in Alaska and winters in Baja California .There are an estimated 115,000 black brant in the world and about 14,000 are taken each year by hunters .

Black brant .The black brant or Pacific brent goose ( Branta bernicla nigricans ) is a subspecies of the brant goose that breeds in Alaska and winters in Baja California .There are an estimated 115,000 black brant in the world and about 14,000 are taken each year by hunters .
